name: Notched Axe
recharge: At the start of each new floor

name: Wavy Cap
recharge: Starts at 1 second, increasing by every time you use it. After 10 uses it stops auto recharging.

name: Larynx
recharge: 12 rooms (Can be used with partial charges)

name: Eraser
recharge: 1 room (Can only be used once per floor)
